statements: SELECT * FROM fitness_classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_schedule FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_type = 'Yoga';
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE participants_count >= 10;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(*) AS class_count FROM fitness_classes GROUP BY instructor_name;
SELECT class_id, class_name, participants_count FROM fitness_classes WHERE participants_count IS NULL OR participants_count < 5;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE participants_count > 10 ORDER BY class_name DESC
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_type = 'Yoga' AND participants_count > 5
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_schedule >= '2022-09-01 00:00:00' AND class_schedule <= '2022-09-30 23:59:59'
SELECT class_name, class_type FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY class_type ASC
SELECT class_name, class_type, participants_count FROM fitness_classes WHERE participants_count IS NULL
SELECT * FROM class_participation;
SELECT participant_id, class_id, participation_date FROM class_participation ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_schedule FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_schedule LIKE '%AM%';
SELECT * FROM class_participation INNER JOIN fitness_classes ON class_participation.class_id = fitness_classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM class_participation WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT participant_id, class_id, participation_date FROM class_participation WHERE class_id = 2 ORDER BY participation_date DESC
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_name LIKE '%Yoga%'
SELECT * FROM class_participation JOIN fitness_classes ON class_participation.class_id = fitness_classes.class_id
SELECT participant_id, class_name, class_schedule FROM class_participation JOIN fitness_classes ON class_participation.class_id = fitness_classes.class_id WHERE participant_id = 3
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_schedule DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE class_instructor = 'John Doe';

SELECT class_name, class_instructor, COUNT(*) as total_participants FROM GroupFitnessClasses JOIN ClassParticipation ON GroupFitnessClasses.class_id = ClassParticipation.class_id GROUP BY class_name, class_instructor;
SELECT DISTINCT class_instructor FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_instructor ASC;
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE class_schedule >= NOW();
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_schedule DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClassParticipation WHERE duration_min > 30;

SELECT class_name, member_name, participation_date FROM GroupFitnessClasses JOIN ClassParticipation ON GroupFitnessClasses.class_id = ClassParticipation.class_id JOIN MemberData ON ClassParticipation.member_id = MemberData.member_id;
SELECT * FROM class_participation;
SELECT member_id, participation_date, participation_time FROM class_participation;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_location FROM class_details;
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email, member_phone FROM member_details;
SELECT schedule_id, class_id, schedule_day, schedule_time, schedule_duration FROM class_schedule;
SELECT * FROM class_participation ORDER BY participation_date DESC, participation_time ASC
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_location FROM class_details WHERE class_duration > 60
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM member_details WHERE member_join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_duration FROM class_details WHERE class_location = 'Gym A'
SELECT * FROM class_schedule ORDER BY schedule_day ASC, schedule_time ASC
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE class_type = 'Yoga'
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM classes ORDER BY class_schedule DESC
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_phone IS NOT NULL
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM members WHERE member_age > 30 ORDER BY member_name ASC
SELECT registration_id, class_id, member_id, registration_date FROM registrations
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE class_type = 'Yoga'
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM classes ORDER BY class_schedule DESC
SELECT classes.class_name, instructors.instructor_name FROM classes INNER JOIN instructors ON classes.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id
SELECT member_name, member_age FROM members WHERE member_age > 30 ORDER BY member_name
SELECT registrations.class_id, members.member_name, registrations.registration_date FROM registrations INNER JOIN members ON registrations.member_id = members.member_id
